ygData.subject: Character Stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: I hope this finds all of you doing well:) Basically I ll sending this down because I maybe starting a new character on Brell. I like my Rogue but as of this
ygData.messageBody:
I hope this finds all of you doing well:) Basically I'll sending this
down because I maybe starting a new character on Brell. I like my
Rogue but as of this new patch they still havnt done anything about
fixing sneak/hide so they work well (like on the Test Server). Yes
its nice they did something about our Poison skills (they'll probably
be royally screwed up at first;) but honestly the class needs help
and the stealth thing was a step in the right direction. I guess
someone at Verant must REALLY hate Rogues...
Sorry, I'm disgruntled;)
Anyway I was thinking of giving an Enchanter a spin, only class I
really havnt played besides Magician. And if they ever implement
enchanting weapons it would definatly be a good skill Guild-wise.
He'll probably be a High Elf with a name like Timarius (because of
my twisted sense of humour;), if your not a Monty Python fan you
may not get that:)
Anyway just dropping you all a line, take care:)

Lonewolf
